original_text: and Asaph the father of Jehoshaphat, and Jehoshaphat the father of Joram, and Joram the father of Uzziah,
korean_text: 아사는 여호사밧을 낳고 여호사밧은 요람을 낳고 요람은 웃시야를 낳고

sentences.original_text: and Asaph the father of Jehoshaphat,
and Jehoshaphat the father of Joram,
and Joram the father of Uzziah,
